referenceObject.reference: Yang, L., He, Q. Q. & Yao, Z. Y. (2024). Taxonomic study of four closely-related species of the Pholcus yichengicus species group (Araneae, Pholcidae) from China’s Qinling Mountains: an integrated morphological and molecular approach.
